verses.verse: And the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, what is the vine <WH1612> - tree <WH6086> more than any tree <WH6086>, the vine-branch <WH2156> which is among the trees <WH6086> of the forest <WH3293>?
Shall wood <WH6086> be taken <WH3947> thereof to make <WH6213> any work <WH4399>? or will men take <WH3947> a pin <WH3489> of it to hang <WH8518> any vessel thereon <WH3627>?

Behold <WH5414>, it is cast into the fire <WH784> for fuel <WH402>; the fire <WH784> hath devoured <WH398> both <WH8147> the ends <WH7098> of it <WH8432>, and the midst of it is burned <WH2787>: is it profitable <WH6743> for any work <WH4399>?

Behold <WH8549>, when it was whole, it was meet <WH6213> for no work <WH4399>: how much less <WH784>, when the fire hath devoured <WH398> it <WH2787>, and it is burned, shall it yet be meet <WH6213> for any work <WH4399>!

Therefore thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: As the vine <WH1612> - tree <WH6086> among the trees <WH6086> of the forest <WH3293>, which I have given <WH5414> to the fire <WH784> for fuel <WH402>, so will I give <WH5414> the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389>.

And I will set <WH5414> my face <WH6440> against them <WH3318>; they shall go forth from the fire <WH784>, but the fire <WH784> shall devour <WH398> them <WH3045>; and ye shall know that I am Jehovah <WH3068>, when I set <WH7760> my face against them <WH6440>.
And I will make <WH5414> the land <WH776> desolate <WH8077>, because they have committed <WH4603> a trespass <WH4604>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>.
